&project;
Mladen Turk Roadmap
This document details the current high level plans for the JBossWeb project as a whole. More information can be found in JIRA under the JBWEB project.
Crete SVN Repository inside labs.jboss.com
Build documentation build system using simple xdocs templates.
Create Native build scripts and integrate them with ant build system. Build procedure should procuce a .tar.gz package, zip package, and give preparation for the InstallShield setup packages.
CGI module
PHP Module
.NET Module
Build URL Rewrite valve.
